<VirtualHost *:80>
  ServerName DOMAIN.LAN_HOSTNAME
  ServerAlias www.DOMAIN.LAN_HOSTNAME
  Redirect permanent / https://DOMAIN.LAN_HOSTNAME/
</VirtualHost>
<VirtualHost *:443>
  ServerName DOMAIN.LAN_HOSTNAME
  ServerAlias www.DOMAIN.LAN_HOSTNAME
  DocumentRoot /var/www/DOMAIN
  SSLEngine on
  SSLCertificateFile      /etc/ssl/certs/apache-selfsigned.crt
  SSLCertificateKeyFile   /etc/ssl/private/apache-selfsigned.key
 </VirtualHost>
